name: Fire Ball: Shoot Voxel Blast!
description:
Fire balls, shoot balls & destroy voxel cartoon characters!

Welcome to Voxel blast!

Hold your phone to Fire and eliminate different themes of toy bricks!
This is a brand new type of addictive games this year！
It will give you an unlimited funny experience, sometimes it can be a good challenge to improve your reaction time

How to play:
- Hold to fire balls at the characters
- Don't shoot the moving obstacles
- Upgrade your tank to get more power

Features:
- One GREAT game to fulfill your leisure time
- Addicting way to improve the sensitivity of your fingertip
- 100+ LEVELs with 300+ 3d voxel characters

Don’t just wait over here, download and join us to have fun Immediately!
developers: Word Puzzle & Fun Games For Free
